title: USB attack
extract: BadUSB is a dangerous USB security flaw that allows attackers to turn a simple USB device into a keyboard, which can then be used to type malicious commands into the victim's computer. ... We're exploiting the very way that USB is designed,” he told Wired in July.Oct 3, 2014
extract_html: BadUSB is a dangerous USB security flaw that allows attackers to turn a simple USB device into a keyboard, which can then be used to type malicious commands into the victim's computer. ... We're exploiting the very way that USB is designed,” he told Wired in July.Oct 3, 2014
